scripts.test:sepolia:smoke: env TEST_ENV='sepolia' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps --grep '\[smoke\]' './test/**/**/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:story:smoke: env TEST_ENV='storyTestnet' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps --grep '\[smoke\]' './test/**/**/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:sepolia:e2e: env TEST_ENV='sepolia' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps './test/**/e2e/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:story:e2e: env TEST_ENV='storyTestnet' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps './test/**/e2e/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:sepolia: env TEST_ENV='sepolia' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps './test/**/**/**.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test:story: env TEST_ENV='storyTestnet' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps './test/**/**/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome
